name: Age Of Knights
description: Age of Knights is a metaverse with play-to-earn NFT game designed to provide users with a fun experience by collecting Knights and Ships to travel through the metaverse searching for Gems: the mineral that allows them to live another day and make profit along the way. Age of Knights aims to be the top metaverse game on the blockchain while letting their users enjoy being part of a vast universe and an amazing community without neglecting the thrill of our strategic long-term oriented gameplay. Our metaverse is composed of multiple worlds which will soon become knowledge. Welcome to our first world: Age of Knghts.
